alert.note: Alert for Lafayette (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 18 at 9:49AM CST until January 18 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN LAFAYETTE COUNTY... At 949 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Bradley, or 16 miles west of Springhill, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Bradley around 1000 AM CST. Canfield around 1010 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include State Line, Canale and Gin City. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
